import Link from 'next/link' import { useQuery, gql } from '@apollo/client' import { port } from '../apolloClient' import Layout from '../components/MyLayout' const GET_TOKEN = gql` query getToken { login } ` export default () => { const { data } = useQuery(GET_TOKEN) if (typeof localStorage !== 'undefined' && data && data.login) { localStorage.setItem('token', data.login) } return (

{data && data.login ? {`You are logged in session with token: ${data.login}`} : Login}
